transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Ninja Variety Combo
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Unbuffable by 50%

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Reduces Ninjutsu, Waterspout Technique Cooldown by 1 turn

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets Ninjutsu, Waterspout Technique Cooldown

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000072_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000072_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Elf-Style Hand Seals
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, grants <color=#28d9ed>A Ninja's Afterimage</color> to the caster. \n(Triggered Effect) When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>. Removes 1 <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color> from all allies, and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, grants <color=#28d9ed>A Ninja's Afterimage</color> to the caster. \n(Triggered Effect) When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>. Removes 1 <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color> from all allies, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000072_2_6]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000072_2_6] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Ninjutsu, Waterspout Technique
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. When there is more than one target, ignores 30% of the target's Defense. When there is only one target, ignores <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> of the target's Defense and steals <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases proportional to missing Health.
description: Attacks all enemies. When there is more than one target, ignores 30% of the target's Defense. When there is only one target, ignores <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> of the target's Defense and steals <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and additionally increases proportional to missing Health.

3: +25% Ignored Defense to a single target
5: +25% Ignored Defense to a single target

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000072_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
